main.title:
Evaluate and Optimize
Your Workflows with ServiceNow
main.description:
Align your digital workflows with business outcomes, gain actionable insights through
performance analytics, and continuously improve service delivery using ServiceNow’s
intelligent automation and AI-powered platform.
main.subTitle: The Leading Platform for Enterprise AI and Automation

data.title: Rigorous Evaluation, Real ITSM Intelligence
data.descriptionHtml:
Unlock the full potential of your IT services with intelligent, data-driven insights powered by ServiceNow.

With Performance Analytics and Now Assist for ITSM, ServiceNow enables comprehensive evaluation of incident trends, service effectiveness, and resolution reliability. Leverage predictive intelligence and AI-driven recommendations to continuously improve service delivery, reduce MTTR, and enhance user satisfaction.

Transform operational insights into measurable IT performance gains—all on the trusted Now Platform.

data.subHeader: Leverage ServiceNow’s enterprise-grade AI and automation to thoroughly evaluate and enhance your workflow intelligence across the Now Platform.

cardsData.label: End-to-End ServiceNow Deployment
cardsData.description: Comprehensive implementation services to configure, customize, and deploy ServiceNow solutions that align with your unique business processes and goals.

cardsData.label: ServiceNow Optimization & Performance Tuning
cardsData.description: Analyze and fine-tune your existing ServiceNow environment to boost system performance, reduce technical debt, and enhance overall platform efficiency.

cardsData.label: AI-Driven Workflow Automation
cardsData.description: Leverage ServiceNow’s AI capabilities to automate routine tasks, improve decision-making, and enable predictive service delivery across the enterprise.

detailsTiles.label: IT Operations & Asset Management
detailsTiles.description: Optimize your IT landscape with deep expertise in ITOM, CMDB, Discovery, and IT Asset Management. Gain real-time visibility, automate issue resolution, and drive operational efficiency at scale.

detailsTiles.label: Performance Analytics & APM
detailsTiles.description: Leverage ServiceNow APM and Performance Analytics to track KPIs, evaluate app value, and align your digital investments with business outcomes. Improve strategic planning and reduce tech debt.

detailsTiles.label: HR & Workplace Experience
detailsTiles.description: Deliver seamless employee services through HRSD and Workplace Service Delivery. From onboarding to space management, boost engagement and productivity across the workforce.

detailsTiles.label: Customer & Field Service Management
detailsTiles.description: Transform service delivery with powerful tools for Customer and Field Service Management. Route tasks smartly, manage mobile workforces, and resolve customer issues faster and smarter.

detailsTiles.label: Risk, Compliance & Procurement Ops
detailsTiles.description: Strengthen your enterprise governance with IRM, supplier operations, business continuity, and procurement automation. Manage risk proactively while improving vendor and finance workflows.

detailsTiles.label: App Engine, Automation & Integration
detailsTiles.description: Accelerate innovation using App Engine Studio, low-code tools, and Integration Hub. Deploy ERP workflows, automate tasks with RPA, and seamlessly connect with enterprise systems.

data.heading: Your ServiceNow journey begins with smart, scalable strategy

steps.title: Solution assessment & strategy
steps.description: Our experts begin with a thorough evaluation of your current ServiceNow environment, identifying key opportunities and recommending an optimal path forward tailored to your business goals.

steps.title: Defining scope of work
steps.description: We work closely with stakeholders to define a clear scope—detailing objectives, timelines, and measurable outcomes—ensuring alignment from day one.

steps.title: Solution offering & delivery roadmap
steps.description: Based on the defined scope, we craft a customized solution and phased delivery roadmap, helping you visualize progress while staying agile and outcome-driven.

steps.title: Scale as you need
steps.description: Whether you're rolling out to a single department or scaling enterprise-wide, our flexible approach lets you grow at your pace—with built-in readiness for future expansion.

data.title: Join Our Growing ServiceNow Community
data.descriptionHtml:
Our ecosystem goes beyond project work. We have built a strong community of ServiceNow enthusiasts — a space where professionals share knowledge, explore trends, and connect over coffee (virtual or real).

Join The Community →

main.title:
Data Analytics, Data
Science And Business
Intelligence
main.description:
At Technozis, we help organizations harness the full power
of Salesforce to drive growth, improve customer relationships,
and streamline operations.

data.title: What is INSIGHTS FACTORY?
data.descriptionHtml:
Insights Factory is Technozis’ innovative solution that transforms raw operational data into real-time, actionable insights using Generative AI and advanced analytics. It enables enterprises to optimize processes, reduce manual reporting effort, and improve decision-making across the supply chain and beyond.

By combining dashboards with conversational AI, we empower stakeholders to ask business-critical questions in natural language—and receive insightful, predictive answers instantly.

data.description: Traditional reporting systems are slow, siloed, and often fail to surface insights when they're needed most. Insights Factory solves these problems. Eliminating data silos through centralized intelligence.

data.heading: How We Implement It – 4 Simple Steps
data.subHeading: Our 4-step implementation process ensures low risk, high ROI—guided by domain experts and leading AI tools.

data.title: Ready to Transform Your Data into Decisions?
data.description: With cutting-edge technology, agile execution, and a people-first approach, Technozis is your trusted partner in growth. Let’s build something incredible together.

data.subHeader: We believe people grow best where they are challenged, supported, and inspired. At Technozis, you’ll find more than what you need—you’ll find purpose.
